This also happens for Search views and dialogs which use the deprecated setHelp
API. Deprecated methods should not crash the existing code base.
Changed severity to "major" since it affects all users of the deprecated API.
Help listener was no longer considering the context computer and context array 
cases. Added a check for these cases.

Also our context computers were not considering the case of a help context  
being a single id rather than an IContextComputer or a context array.
